title: Website Takedown
description: Successfully executed a permanent takedown of the Indian Army College of Nursing website through a large-scale, well-coordinated DDoS attack, completely shutting down all online services, disrupting access to critical information, and rendering the site offline for an extended period.

title: Money Bells Deface
description: Successfully Deface the website of Money Bells Global Research Services Pvt. Ltd, and access their internal server and destroy their website and other assets.

title: Server Hacked
description: Breach of the FTP server at the Central University of Haryana, India, resulted in the extraction of sensitive data, including internal documents, user credentials, and system configurations, providing full access to critical systems and posing significant security risks to the institution.

title: Operation IronFist
description: Successfully traced and exposed a major cybercrime ring targeting financial institutions.

title: Operation PhantomStrike
description: Launched offensive measures against a botnet responsible for spreading ransomware across national servers.

title: Operation ThunderGuard
description: Protected major news agencies from coordinated hacking attempts during a critical political event.

title: Operation NightWatch
description: Monitored and neutralized multiple phishing campaigns targeting government officials.

title: Operation SteelBarrier
description: Upgraded firewall systems and successfully defended against zero-day exploits.

title: Operation EchoBlade
description: Intercepted cyberattacks launched through compromised IoT devices within city infrastructure.
